lead_paragraph: Red Sox TV analyst Jerry Remy was hit in the head by a falling TV monitor as swirling winds caused havoc during the first inning at Fenway Park.

headline.print_headline: Red Sox Analyst Remy Struck by Monitor as Wind Causes Havoc
